messages.title: OUR NHS... AT RISK!
messages.content: Senior Conservative Dan Hannan, Summer 2009: 'We've lived through this mistake for 60 years now... The reality is that [the NHS] hasn't worked -- it has made people iller...' Daily Mail, Jan 2010: Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm boss. Daily Telegraph, Dec 2009: David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners

messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket. Nick Clegg's plan means that no one pays tax on the first £10,000 they earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can't win in Arundel & South Downs. Voting for them will just help elect a Conservative MP. Only a vote for Derek Deedman will bring real change for our area.

issues.health: OUR NHS... AT RISK! - Highlights potential threats to NHS under Conservative policies.

quotes.text: We've lived through this mistake for 60 years now... The reality is that [the NHS] hasn't worked -- it has made people iller...
Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm boss.
David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners

images.caption: Derek Deedman stands next to a sign of his name, advocating for change.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes the tactical situation in the constituency, urging voters that a vote for Labour will not result in change but a vote for Derek Deedman could.
